title: Russia says it will take no immediate action on damaged Soyuz spacecraft
summary: In reality, the Soyuz is a hardy spacecraft.

title: South Korean spacecraft enters lunar orbit with deceleration maneuver
summary: South Korea’s first robotic lunar orbiter, Danuri, entered the lunar orbit after conducting its first lunar orbit insertion maneuver Dec. 16.

title: SpaceX aces three Falcon 9 launches in 34 hours
summary: SpaceX has successfully launched three Falcon 9 rockets less than 34 hours apart, leaving the company only one mission shy of CEO...

title: L3Harris to acquire Aerojet Rocketdyne for $4.7 billion
summary: L3Harris Technologies on Dec. 18 announced an agreement to acquire Aerojet Rocketdyne for $4.7 billion.

title: NASA signs spaceflight safety agreement with AST SpaceMobile
summary: NASA has signed an agreement with AST SpaceMobile to cooperate on spaceflight safety, even as astronomers grow increasingly concerned about the effects of that company’s satellites.
